--- id: ls03 cost: $10.00 paypal_id: 5Z5L3SQ8UKBTG product_name: Landsknecht Arquebusiers (Handgunners) photoset_id: 72157685793370186 local_nav_weight: 130 short_title: Arquebusiers (Handgunners) title: 10mm Landsknecht Arquebusiers (Handgunners) ---

Landsknechte Doppelsöldner armed with arquebuses (early matchlock firearms) would provide ranged fire support by the flanks of the pike blocks.

This is a Arquebusiers (Handgunners) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve fifteen rank and file strips (a mix of ls03a–e). Bases are not included.

Sculpted by Bob Naismith and cast by D & D Model Cleaning & Casting in lead free pewter.
